SourceProxy.name: OGSTimeAverage
SourceProxy.label: OGS Time Average

Documentation.long_help: This plugin computes time averages on a dataset given a requestor.
Documentation.short_help: Computes time averages on a dataset.

SourceProxy.Documentation: Given a time requestor, this filter computes the time average given a section of the mesh, basin, coast or the whole mediterranean sea.

StringVectorProperty.name: StartTime
StringVectorProperty.label: Start Time:
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the initial timestep for the TimeInterval.

StringVectorProperty.name: EndTime
StringVectorProperty.label: End Time:
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the final timestep for the TimeInterval.

IntVectorProperty.name: use_files
IntVectorProperty.label: Fast Algorithm
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Read from files instead of iterating the pipeline. This algorithm only works with rectilinear grids and cell data.

Hints.WarnOnCreate: **OGS Time Statistics** filter needs to process most of the timesteps available in your dataset and can potentially take a long time to complete. Do you want to continue?
